channel.title: How to make a client leech proof
channel.description: How do i make it so when i upload clients people dont steal it or change things in it. Ive deleted the java files but some people still use a decompiler.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 04:22:34 pm[/size][hr]Anyone? Please
